title: (x) Ariel Gore cartoon-style font - MVB Hotsy Totsy {Marten F}
content:
I need help with an ID of this cartoon-style font. Any help is appreciated.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071220215629im_/http:/typophile.com/files/gore_4097.gif)

 [‹ Cooney's Western-style slab serif](http://web.archive.org/web/20071220215629/http:/typophile.com/node/40211 "Go to previous forum topic") [Victorian Picture Type ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071220215629/http:/typophile.com/node/40182 "Go to next forum topic")
author: rickruss

comments.content: Thanks! I had never heard if it.
